hero.name: Angenor N'Gouandi
hero.description: IT Expert at the International Organisation of La Francophonie, passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in Flutter, Laravel, VueJs and more. I create innovative solutions that make a difference.

home.title: Welcome to My Portfolio

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full Stack Developer & Instructor
about.description: IT Expert at the International Organisation of La Francophonie with a passion for web and mobile development. I also teach at ESATIC where I train the next generation of developers.

webDev.title: Web Development
webDev.description: Creating modern and performant web platforms with Vue.js, Laravel and other technologies.

academicTeaching.description: Instructor at ESATIC since 2023, training Licence 3 students in Web Programming and Multimedia.
